title: Simple strategies to help improve your child's attention, anxiety, mood, and behavior + the best foods to give your child for healthy brain development (with child psychologist Dr. Nicole Beurkens)
description:
***Pre-order my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com/

Register for my 2020 Virtual Mental Health Solutions Summit: https://www.drleafconference.com

Sign up to join my free text program and receive mental health care tips. Just text DRLEAF to 1 (833) 285 3747



SHOW DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I speak with holistic child psychologist and nutrition specialist Dr. Nicole Beurkens about how to improve your children’s attention, anxiety, mood and behavior, the importance of holistic nutrition, sleep and movement for children, how to deal with parent guilt, the truth behind labels like autism and ADHD, and so much more!

For more info on Dr. Nicole visit: https://www.drbeurkens.com

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/simple-strategies-to-help-improve-your-childs-attention-anxiety-mood-amp-behavior-the-best-foods-to-give-your-child-for-healthy-brain-development-with-child-psychologist-dr-nicole-beurkens


**Special offers from our sponsors:

-Function of Beauty (I love all their hair products, which are fully customizable and natural—my hair has never felt and looked so healthy and strong!): Go to https://functionofbeauty.com/drleaf for 20% off your first order!

-International Justice Mission: For just $45, you can provide trauma-informed therapy that will change a child's life. Head to https://IJM.org/DrLeaf, and help vulnerable children heal by giving the gift of therapy today.


Podcast Highlights

4:25 The failure of conventional child psychology, and why a holistic approach to children’s mental health is so important

7:00 Why mental health labels don’t solve mental health problems

7:55 The truth behind labels like ADHD

10:40 What is wrong with the current psychiatric model of mental health, and why one pill won’t treat all your child’s issues

18:33 The relationship between children’s nutrition and mental health

19:30 Why parents or guardians are  often forced or pressured into giving their children psychiatric medication

23:31 Advice for a parent whose child is battling with their mental health

29:50 The importance of reading for a child’s development

32:50 How too much sugar can impact a child’s brain function and mental health

38:33 What exactly is autism, and how can you help your child if they have been diagnosed with autism?

49:56 How to help your child and teenager if they are anxious or stressed
